TEXT.French: Pilleurs Automatisés ignorent les dangers

TEXT.English: Troops automated to pillage will ignore enemy units and may enter dangerous situations.
TEXT.French: Les Unités réalisant des pillages automatiquement vont ignorer la présence d'unités ennemies et peuvent donc se mettre dans des situations dangereuses.
TEXT.German: Troops automated to pillage will ignore enemy units and may enter dangerous situations.
TEXT.Italian: Troops automated to pillage will ignore enemy units and may enter dangerous situations.
TEXT.Spanish: Troops automated to pillage will ignore enemy units and may enter dangerous situations.

TEXT.French: Pilleurs Automatisés évitent les Barbares

TEXT.English: Troops automated to pillage will avoid entering barbarian territory and will not pillage barbarian settlements.
TEXT.French: Les Unités réalisant des pillages automatiquement vont éviter d'entrer dans les territoires des barbares et ne vont pas piller leurs installations.
TEXT.German: Troops automated to pillage will avoid entering barbarian territory and will not pillage barbarian settlements.
TEXT.Italian: Troops automated to pillage will avoid entering barbarian territory and will not pillage barbarian settlements.
TEXT.Spanish: Troops automated to pillage will avoid entering barbarian territory and will not pillage barbarian settlements.

TEXT.French: Unités aériennes Automatisées changent de base

TEXT.English: Automated Strike Craft will be allowed to rebase into more offensive positions
TEXT.French: Les Unités aériennes Automatisées peuvent changer de base pour atteindre des positions plus offensives.
TEXT.German: Automated Strike Craft will be allowed to rebase into more offensive positions
TEXT.Italian: Automated Strike Craft will be allowed to rebase into more offensive positions
TEXT.Spanish: Automated Strike Craft will be allowed to rebase into more offensive positions

TEXT.French: Unités aériennes Automatisées peuvent défendre

TEXT.English: Automated Strike Craft will be allowed to intercept potiental enemy aircraft
TEXT.French: Les Unités aériennes Automatisées peuvent être autorisée à intercepter les unités aériennes ennemies.
TEXT.German: Automated Strike Craft will be allowed to intercept potiental enemy aircraft
TEXT.Italian: Automated Strike Craft will be allowed to intercept potiental enemy aircraft
TEXT.Spanish: Automated Strike Craft will be allowed to intercept potiental enemy aircraft

TEXT.French: Explorateurs Automatisés ne se soignent pas

TEXT.English: Automated Explorers will not be allowed to heal
TEXT.French: Les Explorateurs Automatisés ne sont pas autorisés à se soigner
TEXT.German: Automated Explorers will not be allowed to heal
TEXT.Italian: Automated Explorers will not be allowed to heal
TEXT.Spanish: Automated Explorers will not be allowed to heal

TEXT.French: Pillage Automatisé

TEXT.English: Send the unit to search and destroy enemy's improvements
TEXT.French: Envoie l'unité pour rechercher et détruire les aménagements de terrain ennemis.
TEXT.German: Send the unit to search and destroy enemy's improvements
TEXT.Italian: Send the unit to search and destroy enemy's improvements
TEXT.Spanish: Send the unit to search and destroy enemy's improvements

TEXT.French: Traque Automatisée

TEXT.English: Send the unit to patrol your civilization's borders and kill invading enemy units
TEXT.French: Envoi l'unité patrouiller les frontières et tuer les envahisseurs ennemis.
TEXT.German: Send the unit to patrol your civilization's borders and kill invading enemy units
TEXT.Italian: Send the unit to patrol your civilization's borders and kill invading enemy units
TEXT.Spanish: Send the unit to patrol your civilization's borders and kill invading enemy units

TEXT.French: Défense de Ville Automatisée

TEXT.English: Will protect the city from nearby attackers.
TEXT.French: L'unité protège la Ville des attaquants à proximité.
TEXT.German: Will protect the city from nearby attackers.
TEXT.Italian: Will protect the city from nearby attackers.
TEXT.Spanish: Will protect the city from nearby attackers.

TEXT.French: Patrouille Automatisée

TEXT.English: Send the unit to hunt down and kill any enemy units it can find.
TEXT.French: Envoi l'unité pour traquer et tuer toutes les unités ennemies.
TEXT.German: Send the unit to hunt down and kill any enemy units it can find.
TEXT.Italian: Send the unit to hunt down and kill any enemy units it can find.
TEXT.Spanish: Send the unit to hunt down and kill any enemy units it can find.

TEXT.French: Accélération Automatisée

TEXT.English: Send the unit to hurry the construction of a building in a nearby city.
TEXT.French: Envoi l'unité pour accélérer la construction d'un bâtiment dans la ville la plus proche.
TEXT.German: Send the unit to hurry the construction of a building in a nearby city.
TEXT.Italian: Send the unit to hurry the construction of a building in a nearby city.
TEXT.Spanish: Send the unit to hurry the construction of a building in a nearby city.

TEXT.French: Piratage Automatisé

TEXT.English: Send the unit to plunder and raid nearby settlements, and sink weak or unprotected transports.
TEXT.French: Envoi l'unité pour piller et couller les transports sans protections et les installations maritimes.
TEXT.German: Send the unit to plunder and raid nearby settlements, and sink weak or unprotected transports.
TEXT.Italian: Send the unit to plunder and raid nearby settlements, and sink weak or unprotected transports.
TEXT.Spanish: Send the unit to plunder and raid nearby settlements, and sink weak or unprotected transports.

TEXT.French: Interception Automatisé

TEXT.English: Send the unit to attack enemy units whereever possible.
TEXT.French: Envoi l'unité attaquer les unités ennemies dès que possible.
TEXT.German: Send the unit to attack enemy units whereever possible.
TEXT.Italian: Send the unit to attack enemy units whereever possible.
TEXT.Spanish: Send the unit to attack enemy units whereever possible.

TEXT.French: Bombardement Automatisé

TEXT.English: Send the unit to attack enemy fortifications, improvements, and cities wherevever possible.
TEXT.French: Envoi l'unité attaquer les fortifications ennemies, les aménagement et les Villes dès que possible.
TEXT.German: Send the unit to attack enemy fortifications, improvements, and cities wherevever possible.
TEXT.Italian: Send the unit to attack enemy fortifications, improvements, and cities wherevever possible.
TEXT.Spanish: Send the unit to attack enemy fortifications, improvements, and cities wherevever possible.

TEXT.English: Patrolling Units will not leave friendly borders
TEXT.French: Unités patrouillent à l'intérieur de leurs frontières
TEXT.German: Patrolling Units will not leave friendly borders
TEXT.Italian: Patrolling Units will not leave friendly borders
TEXT.Spanish: Patrolling Units will not leave friendly borders

TEXT.English: Units Automated to Border Patrol will not leave friendly territory for any reason.
TEXT.French: Les Unités Automatisées pour la Patrouille des frontières resteront toujours à l'intérieur de leur territoire.
TEXT.German: Units Automated to Border Patrol will not leave friendly territory for any reason.
TEXT.Italian: Units Automated to Border Patrol will not leave friendly territory for any reason.
TEXT.Spanish: Units Automated to Border Patrol will not leave friendly territory for any reason.

TEXT.French: Récolte d'Infos

TEXT.English: This unit will gather intelligence and not awaken until it reaches the maximum espionage bonus
TEXT.French: Cette Unité va récolter des Informations et devenir à nouveau active lorsqu'elle aura atteint son bonus maximum d'espionnage.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit wird Informationen sammeln und nicht aufwachen bis sie ihr Maximum an Spionagepunkten erreicht hat
TEXT.Italian: This unit will gather intelligence and not awaken until it reaches the maximum espionage bonus
TEXT.Spanish: This unit will gather intelligence and not awaken until it reaches the maximum espionage bonus

TEXT.French: Reconnaissance aérienne Automatisée
Effectue automatiquement des opérations de reconnaissance
Améliorations automatisées

TEXT.English: Will Upgrade to New Units whenever possible.
TEXT.French: Améliore automatiquement les Unités lorsque c'est possible.
TEXT.German: Will Upgrade to New Units whenever possible.
TEXT.Italian: Will Upgrade to New Units whenever possible.
TEXT.Spanish: Will Upgrade to New Units whenever possible.

TEXT.French: Annuler les Améliorations automatisées
Annule les ordres d'Améliorations automatisées
Promotions Automatisées

TEXT.English: Will auto-promote whenever the unit can gain a promotion
TEXT.French: Attribue automaiquement une promotion lorsque l'unité peut en gagner
TEXT.German: Will auto-promote whenever the unit can gain a promotion
TEXT.Italian: Will auto-promote whenever the unit can gain a promotion
TEXT.Spanish: Will auto-promote whenever the unit can gain a promotion

TEXT.French: Annuler Promotions Automatisées
Annule les ordres de Promotions Automatisées
Protection Automatisée

TEXT.English: Allows selection of a unit to protect and escort.
TEXT.French: Donne à la sélection d'unité la mission de protéger et escorter.
TEXT.German: Allows selection of a unit to protect and escort.
TEXT.Italian: Allows selection of a unit to protect and escort.
TEXT.Spanish: Allows selection of a unit to protect and escort.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]The %s1 is faster than your %s2. Only units with %d3 or more moves can protect a %s4.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT][NUM1:Le:La:Les:Les] %s1 est plus rapide que votre %s2. Seules les unités avec au moins %d3 de déplacement peuvent protéger [NUM4:un:une:des:des] %s4.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]The %s1 is faster than your %s2. Only units with %d3 or more moves can protect a %s4.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]The %s1 is faster than your %s2. Only units with %d3 or more moves can protect a %s4.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]The %s1 is faster than your %s2. Only units with %d3 or more moves can protect a %s4.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT][NUM1:Le:La:Les:Les] %s1 n'est pas dans votre équipe![COLOR_REVERT]
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]L'unité ne peut pas se protéger elle-même![COLOR_REVERT]
Choisissez une unité à protéger :
Choisir la Technologie désirée

TEXT.English: Allows selection of a of the desired discovery tech. The unit will sleep until that tech becomes available to research, and then will be consumed in researching it.
TEXT.French: Permet à la sélection d'unité d'aider à la découvert d'une technologier. L'unité sera en veille jusqu'à ce que la technologie soit découverte, puis sera enlevée.
TEXT.German: Allows selection of a of the desired discovery tech. The unit will sleep until that tech becomes available to research, and then will be consumed in researching it.
TEXT.Italian: Allows selection of a of the desired discovery tech. The unit will sleep until that tech becomes available to research, and then will be consumed in researching it.
TEXT.Spanish: Allows selection of a of the desired discovery tech. The unit will sleep until that tech becomes available to research, and then will be consumed in researching it.

TEXT.French: Choisissez la Technologie désirée :
